page.title: 02Police Service in Clun Area
page.content: There is one police constable in Clun. His name is Trevor Anthony Balch and his age is 23 .The area he covers is about 400 square miles which he said was the largest beat in the country. There have been about 125 reported crimes in our block in the last year. Most of these were at farms which have had machinery and (rarely) cattle stolen. About 75% of these crimes have been solved. P.C. Balch has had to learn about farming. He likes Clun rather than a larger town because he is the only policeman and can do a whole enquiry by himself. Previously he worked at Ludlow and on the Clee hills. This is the order of P.C. Balches shifts: 7 days on, 3 days off; 8 days on, 3 days off.
